mapper.select: WITH overlappings AS ( SELECT 'http://marineregions.org/mrgid/' || political_eez.mrgid_eez AS id, 'PoliticalEEZ' AS type, 'http://marineregions.org' AS source, political_eez.union AS title, iso_map.iso2 AS isoCountryCode2Digit, geom, centroid_geom FROM political_eez LEFT OUTER JOIN iso_map ON political_eez.iso_ter1 = iso_map.iso3 WHERE geom && ST_MakeBox2D(ST_Point(#{b1}, #{b2}), ST_Point(#{b3}, #{b4})) ), intersectings AS ( SELECT * FROM overlappings WHERE ST_AsMVTGeom(geom,ST_MakeBox2D(ST_Point(#{b1}, #{b2}), ST_Point(#{b3}, #{b4})),4096,0,true) IS NOT NULL ) SELECT ST_ASMVT(tile, 'political_eez', 4096, 'mvtgeometry') AS t FROM ( SELECT id, type, source, title, isoCountryCode2Digit, ST_AsMVTGeom(geom,ST_MakeBox2D(ST_Point(#{b1}, #{b2}), ST_Point(#{b3}, #{b4})),4096,0,true) AS mvtgeometry FROM intersectings UNION ALL SELECT id, type, source, title, isoCountryCode2Digit, ST_AsMVTGeom(centroid_geom,ST_MakeBox2D(ST_Point(#{b1}, #{b2}), ST_Point(#{b3}, #{b4})),4096,0,true) AS mvtgeometry FROM intersectings ) AS tile;

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tile_cache (layer, z, x, y, tile, timeTaken) VALUES (#{layer}, #{z}, #{x}, #{y}, #{tile.t}, #{timeTaken});
mapper.select: SELECT tile AS t FROM tile_cache WHERE layer = #{layer} AND z = #{z} AND x = #{x} AND y = #{y} LIMIT 1;
